name: The Simpsons: Hit & Run
description:
Includes Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Multiplayer Launcher v16, for:

- Improved game compatibility on modern computers.

- Tweaks to change how the game runs.

- The ability to play mods for the game, with other players.

For more info on the multiplayer launcher, see https://donut.team/q/mp.

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Lucas Stuff/Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools/Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Multiplayer Launcher/Launch.exe

extract.dst: drive_c/Program Files/Lucas Stuff/Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools/Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Multiplayer Launcher/

task.description: Setting mod launcher game EXE path registry key
task.path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Lucas Stuff\Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools\
task.name: set_regedit

task.description: Setting mod launcher game directory path registry key
task.path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Lucas Stuff\Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools\
task.name: set_regedit

content:
files:
- multiplayer-launcher-archive: http://multiplayer.donutteam.com/game/sharmp/downloads/sharmp16.zip
game:
  custom-name: Lucas Simpsons Hit & Run Multiplayer
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Lucas Stuff/Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools/Lucas' Simpsons
    Hit & Run Multiplayer Launcher/Launch.exe
installer:
- task:
    app: dotnet35sp1
    description: Installing .NET 3.5 Service Pack 1 runtime
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    description: Extracting mod launcher archive
    dst: drive_c/Program Files/Lucas Stuff/Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools/Lucas'
      Simpsons Hit & Run Multiplayer Launcher/
    file: multiplayer-launcher-archive
- task:
    description: Setting mod launcher game EXE path registry key
    key: Game EXE Path
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Lucas Stuff\Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: $GAMEDIR/Simpsons.exe
- task:
    description: Setting mod launcher game directory path registry key
    key: Game Path
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Lucas Stuff\Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: $GAMEDIR
